function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate measurement of tracer decay rates","Impact":"Misleading data on the decay of contaminants in the built environment","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate measurement techniques and criteria for data analysis","Technologies":"Advanced sensors, data processing software","People":"Researchers, environmental scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental monitoring agencies"},{"Description":"Overestimation of air change rates","Impact":"Misinterpretation of ventilation effectiveness in controlling contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Calibrate measurement instruments and validate data against multiple methods","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, computational fluid dynamics simulation","People":"Building engineers, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Building management, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Unreliable conclusions on air flow dynamics","Impact":"Misguided strategies for controlling airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use validated computational models and empirical data for analysis","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics software, air flow visualization techniques","People":"Public health officials, building engineers","Owner":"Public health agencies, building management"}]}
